KNOWLEDGE HUB

The Knowledge Hub, an initiative spearheaded by the Academic Quality Office (AQO) in collaboration with the Centre for Academic Development (CAD) at British University Vietnam (BUV). Committed to raising the standards of teaching and learning, the Knowledge Hub stands as a pillar of excellence, cultivating an environment where faculty members can excel and attain their highest potential.

Fostering Teaching and Learning at BUV:

By offering a sophisticated blend of workshops, training sessions, and professional development opportunities, we aim to support and empower our faculty, ensuring they remain at the vanguard of educational innovation and effectiveness.

Knowledge Hub is a collaborative endeavor toward academic distinction, where the continuous exchange of best practices and an unwavering commitment to lifelong learning constitute the foundation of our mission.
